//Headings Record Product Google Map Share with Friends & Family
//Description
Record your products, add the name, image, price, and any other relevant information for the products you want to buy.
Include the location of the shop where you can purchase the product. This can be helpful for making a physical purchase.
Send product details to your family through a messaging app or email.
